resources.string: To start demonstration say \"oh mighty computer\".
Say \"open\", \"close\" or \"dial\" to choose the grammar, language model or phonetic decoder example.
To try recognition of a weather forecast like \"sunny spells on Wednesday\".
Say Tom, Kevin or John to call any one of them.
Say some program name - bluetooth, music or maps to close.
Say some program name - bluetooth, music, car status or maps to open.
What do you want to search - Direction(destination city), restaurants, hotels, gas stations
